Ledakan Kombes Dinilai Buat Banyak Polisi Duduki Jabatan Sipil
07 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Mantan Kapolri Jenderal (Purn) Tito Karnavian meminta maaf tidak bisa menyenangkan semua pihak selama menjabat dan menyinggung terkait ledakan Komisaris Besar (Kombes). Pengamat politik Adi Prayitno menilai ledakan Kombes akan membuat banyak jabatan publik yang diisi oleh kepolisian.
"Salah satu yang paling mungkin diprediksi dari ledakan kombes ini akan banyak jabatan-jabatan publik yang selama ini dipegang sipil akan diisi polisi," ujar Adi saat dihubungi Rabu (6/11/2019).
Adi mengatakan, saat ini banyak posisi yang seharusnya jabat oleh warga sipil namun justru diisi dari pihak kepolisian. Menurutnya ke depan hal ini harus diatasi, karena adanya kekhawatiran kembalinya dwi fungsi polisi seperti masa orde baru.
"Buktinya sudah banyak seperti Bulog, PSSI, Pramuka dan lain-lain dari Polisi. Tentu ini tak bisa dihindari. Ke depan harus ada rekayasa agar luberan kombes ini tak menyasar posisi yang selama ini diisi kalangan sipil, karena ada trauma masa lalu zaman orba," kata Adi.
"Publik trauma dan khawatir soal potensi kembalinya dwi fungsi polisi/tentara, seperti orba tapi dalam wujud lain," sambungnya.

The Kombes Explosion is Judged For Many Police Officers in Civil Servants
Nov 7 2019, 06:01 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Former National Police Chief Gen. (Ret) Tito Karnavian apologized for not being able to please all parties during his tenure and alluded to the explosion of the Great Commissioner (Kombes). Political observer Adi Prayitno believes the Kombes explosion will make many public positions filled by the police.
"One of the most likely predictions from the explosion of this kombes will be that many public positions held by civilians will be filled by the police," Adi said when contacted Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Adi said that currently many positions should be held by civilians but instead were filled by the police. According to him in the future this must be addressed, because of fears of the return of the dual functions of the police such as the New Order.
"The proof is that there have been many such as Bulog, PSSI, Scouts and others from the Police. Of course this can not be avoided. In the future there must be engineering so that the overflow of the Kombes does not target the positions that have been filled by civilians, because there is trauma from the New Order era, "said Adi.
"The public is traumatized and worried about the potential return of the dual functions of the police / army, like the New Order but in other forms," he continued.
